tabs.title: Description
tabs.content:
Virtual Reality is one of the growing technology with a lot of potential capabilities.

It holds the key to our future and it will change the "definition" of reality you're familiar with.

The pioneer in this technology is the tech giant "Samsung".


Samsung’s Gear VR is the first major virtual reality headset to hit the market.

You won't believe it unless you see it. So, here comes an opportunity to fool your senses.

 

Do you really want to escape into the land of imagination? Want to chase that white rabbit down the hole by yourself?

Do you think you're capable of handling the overwhelming experience? Then just walk into our exhibition and be beamed out to the new world.

Once you walk in, you will never be the same person when you walk out.

Venue: k!arnival zone
